Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャ
Entry.EnglishText: Misha

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Agarte>
Entry.EnglishText: <Agarte>

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア
Entry.EnglishText: Curia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: トミッチ
Entry.EnglishText: Tomich

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車屋
Entry.EnglishText: Carriage Coach

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Grandma

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 雑貨屋
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: 雑貨屋
Entry.EnglishText: General Store

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>の連中が首都に行くなら、 ここから船に乗るんだな？
Entry.EnglishText: If the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> are going to the capital, they would have taken a ship from here, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、そうだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Exactly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 早くこの娘を医者に預けて、 オレたちも船に乗ろう。
Entry.EnglishText: Then let's hurry and get her to a doctor so that we can catch one, too.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん。 まずは、お医者さんを 探さなくっちゃネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Right. We'll have to find us a doctor first though.

Entry.JapaneseText: 何かお困りですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is something the matter?

Entry.JapaneseText: 具合の悪い連れがいるんだ。 どこかに医者はいないか？
Entry.EnglishText: We have a companion who is unwell. Do you know where we could find a doctor for her?

Entry.JapaneseText: それは大変!! すぐにキュリア先生に 診てもらったほうがいいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, how awful! You should take her to see Doctor Curia right away.

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア先生？
Entry.EnglishText: Doctor Curia?

Entry.JapaneseText: この街いちばんのお医者さまです。 ぼくは先生の助手で、 ミーシャっていいます。
Entry.EnglishText: She's the best doctor in town. I'm her assistant, Misha.

Entry.JapaneseText: すぐに先生の所へ 案内してくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Can you take us to her？

Entry.JapaneseText: 先生は今、街を回診中です。 ぼくが呼びに行ってきますから、 皆さんは、そこの宿屋で 待っててください。
Entry.EnglishText: She's currently out on a call. I'll go and get her, so please wait for us at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: 助かる。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……大丈夫かな……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is he gonna be all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: とにかく、 俺たちは宿屋で待とう。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's just wait at the inn for now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ。
Entry.EnglishText: Right.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>？ どうしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>? What're you doing here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あの子、 気になったから……
Entry.EnglishText: I've been thinking about that boy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャなら 心配いらないってさ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you mean Misha, Doctor Curia said he'll be fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……よかった……
Entry.EnglishText: ...Thank goodness.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこへ行くつもりだ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where are you planning on going from here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あなたには関係ない。
Entry.EnglishText: ...That's none of your business.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちと一緒に行かないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why don't you come with us?

Entry.JapaneseText: どういうつもりで そんな事……
Entry.EnglishText: What kind of proposition is that?

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺たちの近くにいれば、 俺を殺す機会は いくらでもあるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you're by my side, you'll have plenty of opportunities to kill me.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうした？ それとも もうバースの仇討ちは 終わりにするのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Well? Have you already given up on your desire for vengeance?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたって…… すごく嫌な人ね。
Entry.EnglishText: You... You really are despicable.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてさっき、 わたしをかばったりしたの？
Entry.EnglishText: Why did you shield me from that attack earlier?

Entry.JapaneseText: かばったわけじゃない。 体勢を崩したところに バイラスが飛び込んで来た。 それだけの事だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I wasn't protecting you. My balance was thrown off right as that Birus lunged at you. That's all.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたは本当に…… お父さんを殺したの……？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you really...kill my father?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何度聞いても 答は同じだと思うが？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think asking the same question will give you a different answer?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……行くわ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'll go with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: やったぁ！ 仲間が増えたヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wahoo! A new friend!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……仲間じゃない……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not your friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたの言う事は信用できない…… お父さんを殺したという その言葉さえ……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't trust a word you say. At least not about the death of my father.

Entry.JapaneseText: 真実がわかるまで、あなたを殺さない。 でももし、あなたが父を殺したと いうのが真実なら……
Entry.EnglishText: Until I know the truth, I won't kill you. But if I find out that you truly are my father's killer...

Entry.JapaneseText: 真実だ。
Entry.EnglishText: I am.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……もういい…… 真実かどうかは、わたしが見極める。 だからわたしは、そのために…… あなたと一緒に行く。
Entry.EnglishText: Even so, I will find out the whole truth for myself. For that reason, I will accompany you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Annie>。 そんなにコワイ顔してると、 <Veigue>みたいになっちゃうよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, <Annie>. If you keep it up with that scary glare, you'll end up looking like <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: オレはそんなに恐い顔を しているつもりはない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not trying to look scary, you know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 恐いっていうか、 ネクラなんだよ、<Veigue>は。 だって、全然笑わないんだもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Scary, moody, whatever you'd like to call it. There's never a smile on your face!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……暗い……オレが……
Entry.EnglishText: You think I'm...gloomy?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……うふふっ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehehe...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……今、笑ったか？
Entry.EnglishText: Did you...just laugh?

Entry.JapaneseText: す、すいません……
Entry.EnglishText: Ah, f-forgive me...

Entry.JapaneseText: そのほうがずっといい。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't need to apologize.

Entry.JapaneseText: さあ、出発だ！
Entry.EnglishText: Alright, let's head on out!

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカへ向かおう。 ここから南西に進んだところにある 工業が盛んな街だ。
Entry.EnglishText: We should head to Petnadjanka. It's a booming industrial town located south-west of here.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこに<Blue>王の盾<White>が……？
Entry.EnglishText: Would the <Blue>Royal Shield<White> be going there?

Entry.JapaneseText: 奴らが陸路を進んだのなら、 ここから一番近い街は ペトナジャンカだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If they're traveling by land, Petnadjanka is the closest town.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Blue>王の盾<White>を追ってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: ...You're following the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、<Veigue>の幼なじみの クレアさんがさらわれたんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah. They kidnapped <Veigue>'s childhood friend Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアさんをさらったのは、 <Blue>四星<White>のサレとトーマだ。 ワルトゥも動いている。
Entry.EnglishText: She was taken by Saleh and Tohma of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. Walto is on the move as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>四星<White>？ ミリッツァは？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Four Stars<White>? Is Militsa with them?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ？
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>四星<White>のひとりだ。 俺は名前ぐらいしか 聞いた事はないが……
Entry.EnglishText: She's a member of the <Blue>Four Stars<White>. I only know of her name, however...

Entry.JapaneseText: キミはミリッツァのコトを どこまで知ってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know anything about her?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたしも詳しい事は…… <Blue>四星<White>ただひとりの女性で、 とても強いという噂を 聞いた事があるくらい……
Entry.EnglishText: Not so much... She's the only woman in the <Blue>Four Stars<White> and she's extremely powerful, or so I've heard.

Entry.JapaneseText: きっとそのうち戦うコトに なるんだよネ…… あーあ……気が重いなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: We'll probably have to fight her too, eventually... Ugh, this is annoying...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……今考えても仕方がない。 まずはペトナジャンカに向かおう。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no use in worrying about that right now. Let's make for Petnadjanka.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:340480>が仲間になりました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:340480> joined the party.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><font:80000002><unk19:341080>が同行します。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140><speed:0><unk19:341080> is now travelling with you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>バトルブックに 「属性因子」と 「戦闘用語：陣術」の 説明が追加されました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>In the Battle Book, the "Elemental Attributes" and "Battle Terminology: Rituals" entries have been added.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120>バトルブックを読みますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120>Read the Battle Book? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: おい…… なんか街の下の方が 騒がしくねえか？
Entry.EnglishText: Whoa... Is it me, or does it sound like things are getting heated downtown?

Entry.JapaneseText: 他の街のように、争いが 起きているのかもしれない！
Entry.EnglishText: There are probably fights breaking out here as well, just like in other cities.

Entry.JapaneseText: 見に行こうヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's go check it out!

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの、<Veigue>!?
Entry.EnglishText: What's the matter, <Veigue>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャが昨日、この街で <Red>クレア<White>に会ったらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: Misha said he met <Red>Claire<White> in this city just yesterday!

Entry.JapaneseText: つまり、アガーテって事か？
Entry.EnglishText: You mean to say Agarte was here?

Entry.JapaneseText: まだこの街にいるかもしれない。
Entry.EnglishText: She may still be in town.

Entry.JapaneseText: アガーテが見つかれば、 クレア、おまえも元に戻れる！
Entry.EnglishText: If we find her, then Claire, we should be able to get you back to normal!

Entry.JapaneseText: 先生！ <Veigue>を……
Entry.EnglishText: Doctor, We've lost sight of <Veigue>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 海岸の方へ走って行ったわ!! 危険な状態よ!! 早く行ってあげて!!
Entry.EnglishText: I saw him running toward the coast! The situation is dire! You need to catch up with him immediately!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、<Veigue>。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, there he is.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……なのか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Claire... is that you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたくしはアガーテです。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I am Agarte.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下がおまえを 助けてくださったんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Her Majesty came to your rescue.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……オレと一緒に来てくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Come with me.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこへ？
Entry.EnglishText: Where?

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウストのところだ。 クレアがいる。 あんたのフォルスがあれば……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm taking you to Milhaust, because Claire is with him. If we can use your Force, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: わたくしはもう、フォルスを 使う事ができないのです……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'm no longer capable of using my Force.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうして……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why not...?!

Entry.JapaneseText: わからない…… 何度も試してみました…… でも、どうやってもフォルスは……
Entry.EnglishText: I do not know. I've attempted to time and time again, and yet no matter what I do...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……彼女のところへ行っても、 入れ替わる事も……できない…… わたくしには何も……
Entry.EnglishText: Even if you take me to her, I do not believe that I can change us back... Not as I am now...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I am sorry...

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……
Entry.EnglishText: That's...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……それでもかまわない……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I don't care if you can't...

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたと引き換えなら、 ミルハウストはクレアを 帰してくれるはずだ！
Entry.EnglishText: Because if I bring you to Milhaust, then he should give Claire back to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なぜ、 クレアはあなたのもとを 去ったのですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Why is it that she is no longer with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なに？
Entry.EnglishText: What?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わたくしが行けば、 あなたのところに 戻ってくるのですか……？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you certain that Claire would return to your side if I were to go with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアは…… クレアがこんな事になったのは、 あんたのせいじゃないか！
Entry.EnglishText: She'd... The only reason any of this happened to her is because of you!

Entry.JapaneseText: どんな姿をしていても オレはかまわない！ オレがクレアを守ってやらなきゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care what she looks like! I have to protect her!

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえは、 何もわかっちゃいねえ。
Entry.EnglishText: Man, you really are clueless.

Entry.JapaneseText: 顔貸せよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Come with me for a bit.

Entry.JapaneseText: どけ、オレはアガーテと……
Entry.EnglishText: Back off, Agarte and I areー

Entry.JapaneseText: 顔貸せって言ってんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I said come with me!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 海岸で待ってるぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'll be waiting at the beach.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 頼みがある…… スールズに行かせてほしい……
Entry.EnglishText: I have a favor to ask... I'd like to go to Sulz.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、行こっか!!
Entry.EnglishText: Okay then, let's go!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……本当にいいのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is that really okay with you guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: 行きたいって言ったのは <Veigue>さんですよ？
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you the one who was asking to go?

Entry.JapaneseText: 話したい事があるんでしょ？ ……家族に。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm guessing that there's something you'd like to talk to your family about?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Veigue>、陛下の事だが……
Entry.EnglishText: ...But <Veigue>, what about Her Majesty?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかっている……
Entry.EnglishText: ...I know.

Entry.JapaneseText: 陛下……アガーテ様も、 我々と一緒に行きませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: Your Majesty... Queen Agarte, would you not mind joining us for this trip?

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ……良いのですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh... Would that truly be all right with you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 質問に質問で返すのは 感心しませんな。
Entry.EnglishText: It is impolite to answer a question with another question.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……はい。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I'll come with.

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ、出発だ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Great! Off we go!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた……何しに来たの!? ケガ人を増やすつもりなら 帰ってちょうだい！
Entry.EnglishText: ...Just why are you here?! If you plan on causing more casualties, I suggest you get out of here!

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな……先生…… あっしらも手伝いたくて ここに来たんでさぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: Well actually, Doctor... We've come to help...

Entry.JapaneseText: えっ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: いやぁ……先生たちや <Veigue>たちを見てたら、 自分が恥ずかしくなっちまって……
Entry.EnglishText: Well, seeing how you and Veigue and all the others act, made us feel like a bunch of lowlifes...

Entry.JapaneseText: トミッチさん！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, Tomich!

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう！ まずは傷の手当てからよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: ...Well, thank you! You can start by helping me dress some wounds!

Entry.JapaneseText: 先生、ぼく、ぼく…… うれしいです！
Entry.EnglishText: Doctor... I... I...! This is wonderful!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんな、ようやく気づき始めたのよ。 大切なものが何かって事に。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks like everyone is finally coming to realize what's really important.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……みんな…… あなたたちのがんばりは 無駄じゃなかったわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... Everyone... Your efforts were not in vain!

Entry.JapaneseText: 申し訳ありません。 馬車は運休となっております。
Entry.EnglishText: We're truly sorry, but Carriages are not available for use at the moment.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>お金が足りないようですね。 馬車のご利用料金は <nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>You seem to be short of money. The fee for using the carriage is <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <font:80000002>馬車をご利用になりますか？ 料金は定額で<nmb:12C>ガルドになります。
Entry.EnglishText: <font:80000000>Would you like to use a carriage? The fare is a flat rate of <nmb:12C> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車を利用しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Travel by Carriage? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: スールズ
Entry.EnglishText: Sulz

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール
Entry.EnglishText: Minal

Entry.JapaneseText: ペトナジャンカ
Entry.EnglishText: Petnadjanka

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: アニカマル
Entry.EnglishText: Anikamal

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬車に乗らない
Entry.EnglishText: Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダ
Entry.EnglishText: Razilda

Entry.JapaneseText: ピピスタ
Entry.EnglishText: Pipista

Entry.JapaneseText: キョグエン
Entry.EnglishText: Kyogen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: モクラド
Entry.EnglishText: Mocrado

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>馬車で<unk18:48180528B8048880>に移動します。 料金<nmb:12C>ガルド はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>To travel to <unk18:48180528B8048880> by Carriage, it'll be <nmb:12C> Gald. Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: うちの息子なら 平気ですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: My son will be fine.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな事があったのに、 最近、ずいぶん元気になって……
Entry.EnglishText: Even after everything that happened, he's been feeling much better lately.
Entry.Notes: Deep L says, After all that happened, I've been feeling much better lately. ...... Idk if its the son or g-ma

Entry.JapaneseText: 今はそこの宿屋でお世話に なってるんです。
Entry.EnglishText: We're being taken care of here at the inn.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラジルダから、 命からがら逃げてきました。
Entry.EnglishText: We fled for our lives from Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たち親子に 親切にしてくれた花屋の娘さん…… 無事かしら……
Entry.EnglishText: I hope that flower girl is safe and sound... She was so kind to me and my son.

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋のおかみさんと バルカ港の方へ行ったみたいだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I think she may have gone with the innkeeper to Balka Harbor.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミーシャは街の外に……
Entry.EnglishText: Misha's on the outskirts of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: お願い！ あの子を 助けてあげて……！
Entry.EnglishText: Please! You have to help Misha!!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120> 海岸へ急ぐ 様子を見る
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120> Head to the Coast Wait and see

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く、早く止めないと…… あの子……
Entry.EnglishText: W-We have to stop him... Please... That boy...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120> 海岸へ急ぐ 様子を見る
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120> Head to the Coast Wait and see

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く<Veigue>のところへ!! 海岸よ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry after <Veigue>! He went to the beach!

Entry.JapaneseText: お待ちしておりました。 で、お金の準備はできましたか？
Entry.EnglishText: I’ve been waiting for you. So, have you procured the agreed upon money?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:120> 準備した ちょっと待ってくれ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:120> We have the money Give us a moment

Entry.JapaneseText: 金ならある。
Entry.EnglishText: If it’s money you want, we have it.

Entry.JapaneseText: では、いただきましょうか。
Entry.EnglishText: Well then, I’ll take your payment now.

Entry.JapaneseText: へへ、毎度……
Entry.EnglishText: Hehe, your business is much appreciated...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002><nmb:3E8>ガルド支払いました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><speed:0><scale:140>Paid <nmb:3E8> Gald.

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなに払えない。
Entry.EnglishText: I can't afford to pay that much.

Entry.JapaneseText: 困りましたね…… では、あり金全部で 手を打ちましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: That's too bad. Well, you can just give me all the money you do have.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかった……持っていけ。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, here you go.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと少ないですが、 いいでしょう……
Entry.EnglishText: It's not much, but I guess it will do...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>所持金を全て支払いました。
Entry.EnglishText: You gave away all your money.

Entry.JapaneseText: 金はない。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm flat broke.

Entry.JapaneseText: お話になりませんねぇ……
Entry.EnglishText: Then helping you is out of the question...

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、バルカで目的を果たし ここに戻って来た時には オレの持ち物を全部あんたにやる。 売ればそれなりの金にはなるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...But, when I'm finished with what I need to do in Balka, I'll come back here and give you everything I own. You should be able to sell that for profit.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……わかりました。 その言葉、忘れないでください。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Understood. Please remember what you've promised me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 案内してもらおうか？
Entry.EnglishText: Would you mind leading the way?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうぞ、あちらです。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, right this way.

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと待ってくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hold on...

Entry.JapaneseText: 待てって言われりゃ待ちますけどね。 早くしねぇと日が暮れちまいますぜ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you need me to wait, then I will wait. But be quick, it's not long until sunset.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしたの、<Veigue>？ やっぱり軍の船にもぐりこむ？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you planning on doing, <Veigue>? Are we going to stow away on a military ship instead?

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo... Coo...

Entry.JapaneseText: この地鳴り…… 東の方からだな……
Entry.EnglishText: These tremors are coming from the east...

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき伝令からラジルダが なくなったという 知らせがあったが……
Entry.EnglishText: I just got word that Razilda is gone...

Entry.JapaneseText: なくなるって…… どういう事だ？
Entry.EnglishText: It just... disappeared? What did they mean by that?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマは外に 出ていてもかまわないが……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if Gajuma are wandering outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: そっちのヒューマだけは どこか屋内に閉じ込めておけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Just keep your Huma selves indoors somewhere!
Entry.Notes: Deep L says, Just keep the huma on that side locked up indoors somewhere! both sound a tad janky

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出禁止だぞ!!
Entry.EnglishText: All Huma are forbidden from going outdoors!

Entry.JapaneseText: 大地の怒りだ……！ おそろしい、 おそろしい……
Entry.EnglishText: The earth itself is raging! It's horrible, just horrible...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはヒューマと 一緒にいるべきではない！
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma shouldn't be around Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: いずれ、おまえらの間で 争いが起こるぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sooner or later, you're going to find yourselves quarreling.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは外出禁止だ。
Entry.EnglishText: All Huma must remain indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅の者とて同様。 宿屋内か、さもなければ 街の外へ出ていけ。
Entry.EnglishText: The same applies to you travelers. Either take shelter at the inn, or leave the city.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ……!! 一体、何の音だ……!?
Entry.EnglishText: What the? What the hell is this noise!?

Entry.JapaneseText: すごい地鳴りだったな…… 何が起こったのか、そのうち 正式な発表はあると思うが……
Entry.EnglishText: That was one hell of an earthquake... I'm sure there will be an official statement soon about what happened.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは、屋内に 隔離する事になった。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma must quarantine themselves indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえの連れのヒューマたちも どこか建物内に入るよう言え。
Entry.EnglishText: Tell your Huma friends they need to get somewhere that's indoors.

Entry.JapaneseText: 種族間対立を避けるため、 現在、ヒューマの外出は 禁止している。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to avoid interracial conflicts, Huma must stay indoors at all times.

Entry.JapaneseText: すみやかに屋内に入れ。
Entry.EnglishText: Return to your homes.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール平原に 雪の積もった跡があったって 言うヤツがいたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There was a guy who said that there was remnants of snow on the Minal Plains...

Entry.JapaneseText: 馬鹿言っちゃいけないよな、 この辺りは雪どころか、 雨も降らないんだからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: I told him, "Don't be silly, it doesn't even rain around here, let alone snow."

Entry.JapaneseText: さっき、ガジュマの子が、 街の下の方へスゴイ勢いで 走ってったぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw a Gajuma child making a break for the town center just now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、何をやらかしたんだ？
Entry.EnglishText: What was the matter with him?

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ……！ ガジュマが……!!
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Gajuma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>？ あんたら、船持ってるか？
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>? Well, do you guys have a boat?

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、そいつに乗って 探した方が早くはないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps it would be quicker for you to hop on one and search for it yourselves.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだよ……！ ガジュマが……!!
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Gajuma?!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか知らないけど、 すごくむかつくんだよな。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know what it is, but I'm getting <Italics>very</Italics> irritated...

Entry.JapaneseText: いや、すまん…… あんたにじゃなく、 ガジュマのヤツらだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, sorry... I was talking about the Gajuma, not you folks.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでだろうな……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder why I'm feeling like this?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとは かかわりたくないね。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't want anything to do with Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: アッチ行ってくれ！
Entry.EnglishText: Get away from me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があってもヒューマが悪い、 ヒューマのせい、なんだとさ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Gajuma are always saying that no matter what happens, the Huma are at fault and are always in the wrong.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのヤツら、 自分たちだけで、この街を 作ったみたいな顔しやがって……
Entry.EnglishText: They act like they're the only ones responsible for building this city.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここ港町ミナールは 潮騒の街。
Entry.EnglishText: This is the port town of Minal, also known as the City of Tidal Waves.

Entry.JapaneseText: そしてアカデミックな 一面もあるんだぜ？
Entry.EnglishText: This town also has an academic side to it as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: その答えが知りたきゃ、 役場へ行ってみな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you want to know more, head to the Town Hall.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>…… <Tytree>は海岸だよ…… 行かなくて……いいの？
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>... <Tytree> is on the beach. You know you don't have to meet with him, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: お泊りは夕凪亭へ！
Entry.EnglishText: Come stay at the Silent Night!
